name: Christmas Night (Electric Glitch Studios)
description:
Christmas Eve is a game about someone who dreams of collecting gifts.

In realty it's more like a nightmare ....

And don't forget the PresentMan. He will follow you to your death!
Good luck!

Controls

System Requirements

Cpu:Any dual core cpu will work

Gpu:Intel HD Graphics 4400(for 30fps) and Gt1030/Rx550(for 60+fps)

Ram:2Gb or more
